thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ideal location in Paris
thread.title_full: Ideal location in Paris - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AdasaF
title: Ideal location in Paris
text:
We just got back from an amazing stay in Paris one of my favourite places to visit.
We were able to take the RER B to the RER A and the hotel was right there near the trains, so very easy commute.
Upon arrival we were met by a 'Spendid' hotel attended. Our room was great!.
We had a direct view of the Arc de Triomphe and a panoramic view of Paris. It was priceless.
The room was clean and spacious with modern amenities, TV, mini bar, free internet.
We ordered in room the food was cold and did not taste great, the hotel made up for it but I will be hesitant to recommend the food.
Overall a great stay and will definitely be back!
